definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: It is the ancestor of karate and ju-jitsu.
sentences.chinese: 功夫起源於中國，是空手道和柔術的祖先。

sentences.english: He trains in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu five days a week.
sentences.chinese: 他一個星期還練習五天的巴西柔術。

sentences.english: Before 1900 many variations of jiujitsu were taught.
sentences.chinese: 1900年前，很多流派的柔術在傳授。

sentences.english: Originally Jujutsu was the method of unarmed combat of the Ancient Samurai.
sentences.chinese: 原本柔術是古代日本武士在手無寸鐵時的格鬥用法。

sentences.english: We offer an integrated Muay Thai and Brazilian Jiujitsu program.
sentences.chinese: 我們提供泰拳和巴西柔術的綜合項目。
好比學柔術和場外下注？

sentences.english: The Japanese judo is developed from the jiujitsu.
sentences.chinese: 日本的柔道是從柔術發展過來的。

sentences.english: Some say that any over the age of 25 years shouldn't start contorting .
sentences.chinese: 有些看法是說25歲以上的人不適合開始練柔術。

sentences.english: Also yoga is very similar to contortion.
sentences.chinese: 而且瑜珈和柔術是很相似的。

sentences.english: It's funny how time can manipulate and stretch itself like a contortionist.
sentences.chinese: 時間能像一個柔術演員一樣操縱和伸縮自身。

sentences.english: It is the ancestor of karate and jujitsu.
sentences.chinese: 功夫起源於中國，是空手道和柔術的祖先。

definition: Changquan - Northern Shaolin (北少林) - Longfist - Martial Art
Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art
